summary.span: 表示用于显示图像的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that displays an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 类，可以加载以下图像类型： .bmp、.gif、.ico、.jpg、.png、wdp 和 tiff。The class enables you to load the following image types: .bmp, .gif, .ico, .jpg, .png, .wdp, and .tiff. 显示多帧图像时，仅显示第一帧。When displaying a multiframe image, only the first frame is displayed. 控件不支持多帧图像的动画。The animation of multiframe images is not supported by the control. 在加载图像内容之前，控件的 和 将报告为零，因为图像内容用于确定控件的最终大小和位置。Until the image content is loaded, the and of the control will report as zero, because the image content is used to determine the final size and location of the control. 对于固定大小的控件，可以设置 和/或 属性。For a fixed size control, the and/or properties can be set. 但是，若要保留媒体的纵横比，请设置 或 属性，但不能同时设置两者。However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the or properties but not both.

span.span: WPF Controls Gallery Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 是 并且因为标头损坏而无法加载，则 和 事件都将发生。If the is a and it fails to load, due to a corrupt header, both the and events occur. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage \<*对象*ImageFailed = "*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* ImageFailed="*EventHandler*" .../> ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|，受 约束, constrained by |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像在约束范围内，则该图像将始终返回其自然大小。The image will always return its natural size, if it fits within the constraint. 如果不是，则它将返回大到可以的大小。If not, it will return as large a size as it can.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值描述应如何拉伸 以填充目标矩形。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that describes how an should be stretched to fill the destination rectangle.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值将导致您的图像拉伸以完全填充输出区域。A value of will cause your image to stretch to completely fill the output area. 当输出区域和图像的纵横比不同时，图像就会因拉伸而失真。When the output area and the image have different aspect ratios, the image is distorted by this stretching. 若要使 保持图像的纵横比，请将此属性设置为 （默认值）或 。To make an preserve the aspect ratio of the image, set this property to (default) or . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example demonstrates how to use this property. [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample_snip#ImageSimpleExampleInlineCode2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample_snip/CSharp/ImageSimpleExample.xaml.cs#imagesimpleexampleinlinecode2)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample_snip#ImageSimpleExampleInlineCode2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample_snip/VB/ImageSimpleExample.xaml.vb#imagesimpleexampleinlinecode2)]
